PM-KISAN.description: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi provides an annual income support of â‚¹6,000 to eligible farmer families in three equal installments to meet farming expenses and domestic needs. The funds are transferred directly into the bank accounts of beneficiaries.

Fasal Bima Yojana.description: This scheme provides comprehensive crop insurance against the loss of yield due to non-preventable natural risks like drought, floods, and pests. It offers financial support to farmers suffering crop loss.

Soil Health Card.description: A government-issued report that provides farmers with a detailed nutrient status of their soil, along with recommendations on the appropriate dosage of fertilizers and other soil amendments for their crops.

Krishi Sinchai Yojana.description: This mission focuses on enhancing water use efficiency in agriculture through the promotion of micro-irrigation systems, such as drip and sprinkler irrigation, to ensure 'Per Drop More Crop.' The scheme provides a subsidy for installing these systems.

Interest Subvention Scheme.description: Provides concessional short-term crop loans to farmers at a low interest rate, with an additional subvention for prompt repayment. This aims to ensure easy and affordable credit availability.

Farm Mechanization Scheme.description: Under this scheme, farmers can avail financial assistance and subsidies to purchase farm machinery and equipment, making farming less labor-intensive and more efficient.

Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana.description: A government initiative aimed at achieving a 4% annual growth rate in the agriculture sector by providing grants to states for developing agriculture and allied sectors based on their local needs.

National Food Security Mission.description: A centrally sponsored scheme focused on increasing the production of food grains like rice, wheat, and pulses through the dissemination of improved technologies, farm practices, and resource conservation.
